mapper.sql: id, rule_id, data_source_id, sqlldr_info_id, rule_name, seperator, target_database, source_database, load_type, update_time, sqlldr_info_name
mapper.select:
select r.id, r.data_source_id dataSourceId, s.sqlldr_info_name sqlldrInfoName, rule_name ruleName, source_database sourceDatabase, target_database targetDatabase, seperator seperator from t_import_rule r, t_import_sqlldr_info s where r.sqlldr_info_id = s.sqlldr_info_id
and rule_name like concat('%', #{ruleName}, '%')
and source_database like concat('%', #{sourceDatabase}, '%')
and target_database like concat('%', #{targetDatabase}, '%')
order by id asc limit #{pageNo}, #{pageSize}
select 1 from t_import_rule where id = #{id} limit 1 for update
select rule_name ruleName, rule_id ruleId from t_import_rule
mapper.insert:
insert into t_import_rule
id,
rule_id,
data_source_id,
sqlldr_info_id,
rule_name,
seperator,
target_database,
source_database,
load_type,
update_time,
sqlldr_info_name,
rule_table_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dataSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{seperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{targetDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sourceDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{loadType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sqlldrInfoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ruleTableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_import_rule
rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_source_id = #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sqlldr_info_id = #{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_name = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seperator = #{seperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_database = #{targetDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_database = #{sourceDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
load_type = #{loadType,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sqlldr_info_name = #{sqlldrInfoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_table_id = #{ruleTableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_import_rule set rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_source_id = #{dataSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sqlldr_info_id = #{sqlldrInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_name = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seperator = #{seperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_database = #{targetDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source_database = #{sourceDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, load_type = #{loadType,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sqlldr_info_name = #{sqlldrInfoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_table_id = #{ruleTableId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
